title: How can I use the one button screen lock function?
answer:
Go to **Home** > **Tools** and touch the **Screen Lock** icon and the screen will immediately lock.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151019105951963001.png)
